section.section:
Before adopting an ordinance, resolution, or regulation under subsection (a) of this section, the governing body of the county in which the ordinance, resolution, or regulation will apply shall:
Hold a public hearing and provide reasonable notice of the hearing; and
Obtain the written consent of the Secretary of Natural Resources.
An ordinance, resolution, or regulation adopted without the written consent of the Secretary of Natural Resources is void and without legal effect.

text.section: In the event of a conflict, federal law, State law, or written program guidance issued by a federal or State agency shall preempt any ordinance, resolution, or regulation adopted or any other action taken by the governing body of a county under this section.
